content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":93841,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふふふ、女を知らんな、カオス。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hehe, you don't understand women, Chaos."},{"lineNumber":93842,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あの反応は……」","translatedEnglishLine":"That reaction means...\""},{"lineNumber":93843,"originalJapaneseLine":"「俺に惚れたと見た！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I see she’s fallen for me!\""},{"lineNumber":93844,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えー、そーかなー……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh, really...?\""},{"lineNumber":93845,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はあっ……はあっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hah... hah...\""},{"lineNumber":93846,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ま、まだ心臓がどきどきしてる……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"My heart is still pounding...\""},{"lineNumber":93847,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うう……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh...\""},{"lineNumber":93848,"originalJapaneseLine":"ぎゅうと締め付けられて痛む胸を押さえ、","translatedEnglishLine":"Pressing her chest that was painfully squeezed tightly,"},{"lineNumber":93849,"originalJapaneseLine":"エレナは熱っぽい息を吐いた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Elena let out a feverish breath."},{"lineNumber":93850,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh...\""},{"lineNumber":93851,"originalJapaneseLine":"「王様……格好いい……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The king... is so cool...\""},{"lineNumber":93852,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぽっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"*blush*...\""},{"lineNumber":93853,"originalJapaneseLine":"何故かエレナはランスに惚れていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"For some reason, Elena had fallen in love with Rance."},{"lineNumber":93854,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスがヘルマンの革命に参加していた頃――","translatedEnglishLine":"Back when Rance was participating in Hellman’s revolution—"},{"lineNumber":93855,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス達に敗れたエレナが、","translatedEnglishLine":"Elena, who was defeated by Rance and his group,"},{"lineNumber":93856,"originalJapaneseLine":"血吸いベッタンの呪いから解放されていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"was freed from the curse of the blood-sucking Bettan."},{"lineNumber":93857,"originalJapaneseLine":"「姐御ォ〜……姐御ォ〜……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Big sis~... Big sis~...\""},{"lineNumber":93858,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うう、まさか……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh, I never thought... "},{"lineNumber":93859,"originalJapaneseLine":"　姐御がただの女の子になっちまうなんて……」","translatedEnglishLine":"that big sis would turn into just an ordinary girl...\""},{"lineNumber":93860,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、あの……皆さん……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Um, everyone...\""},{"lineNumber":93861,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うう、すみません……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh, I'm sorry...\""},{"lineNumber":93862,"originalJapaneseLine":"「やめてくれ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Stop it!"},{"lineNumber":93863,"originalJapaneseLine":"　姐御はそんな風に謝ったりしねぇ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Big sis would never apologize like that!\""},{"lineNumber":93864,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ひっ、す、すみません！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, I-I'm sorry!\""},{"lineNumber":93865,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お、おい、馬鹿よせ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"H-hey, cut that out, idiot."},{"lineNumber":93866,"originalJapaneseLine":"　姐御はもう普通の女の子……","translatedEnglishLine":"Big sis is just an ordinary girl now..."},{"lineNumber":93867,"originalJapaneseLine":"　俺達が凄んだらビビるだろう」","translatedEnglishLine":"She’d get scared if we acted tough.\""},{"lineNumber":93868,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うっ……う〜〜……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh... Waaa...\""},{"lineNumber":93869,"originalJapaneseLine":"泣き出すフラワー傭兵団の面々を前に、","translatedEnglishLine":"In front of the members of the Flower Mercenary Group who began to cry,"},{"lineNumber":93870,"originalJapaneseLine":"エレナは何も出来ずおろおろしていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Elena stood helplessly, at a loss for what to do."},{"lineNumber":93871,"originalJapaneseLine":"「す、すみません……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I-I'm sorry... "},{"lineNumber":93872,"originalJapaneseLine":"　皆さんがこんなに悲しんでるのに……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Even though everyone is so sad...\""},{"lineNumber":93873,"originalJapaneseLine":"「私……何も出来なくて……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I... couldn’t do anything...\""},{"lineNumber":93874,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、ああ、いや、いいんだ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, ah, no, it’s fine... "},{"lineNumber":93875,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あんたが悪いわけじゃ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"It's not your fault...\""},{"lineNumber":93876,"originalJapaneseLine":"「悪いな、嬢ちゃん……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Sorry, young lady... "},{"lineNumber":93877,"originalJapaneseLine":"　俺達はここで行くよ……","translatedEnglishLine":"We’re going to leave here now...\""},{"lineNumber":93878,"originalJapaneseLine":"　達者でな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Take care...\""},{"lineNumber":93879,"originalJapaneseLine":"とぼとぼと傭兵団の面々が去って行く。","translatedEnglishLine":"The mercenary group trudged away."},{"lineNumber":93880,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あっ、ま、待って下さい！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, p-please wait!\""},{"lineNumber":93881,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あん？　どうした？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh? What’s wrong?"},{"lineNumber":93882,"originalJapaneseLine":"　もう俺達に用なんて……」","translatedEnglishLine":"You don’t need us anymore...\""},{"lineNumber":93883,"originalJapaneseLine":"「皆さん、ひどい怪我……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Everyone’s badly injured...\""},{"lineNumber":93884,"originalJapaneseLine":"「手当……しましょう」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Let me tend to your wounds.\""},{"lineNumber":93885,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………えっ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Huh?\""},{"lineNumber":93886,"originalJapaneseLine":"「んっ、よし……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Mm, alright...\""},{"lineNumber":93887,"originalJapaneseLine":"　この包帯は一日経ったら交換して下さい」","translatedEnglishLine":"Please change this bandage after one day.\""},{"lineNumber":93888,"originalJapaneseLine":"「次の方は……打ち身ですね。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Next, you have a bruise, right?"},{"lineNumber":93889,"originalJapaneseLine":"　では、この添え木をつけて、","translatedEnglishLine":"Now, I’ll put this splint on,"},{"lineNumber":93890,"originalJapaneseLine":"　よく冷やして……」","translatedEnglishLine":"and cool it well...\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふふふ、女を知らんな、カオス。
「ま、まだ心臓がどきどきしてる……」
ぎゅうと締め付けられて痛む胸を押さえ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Pressing her chest that was painfully squeezed tightly,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エレナは熱っぽい息を吐いた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Elena let out a feverish breath.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何故かエレナはランスに惚れていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: For some reason, Elena had fallen in love with Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスがヘルマンの革命に参加していた頃――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Back when Rance was participating in Hellman’s revolution—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達に敗れたエレナが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Elena, who was defeated by Rance and his group,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 血吸いベッタンの呪いから解放されていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was freed from the curse of the blood-sucking Bettan.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 姐御がただの女の子になっちまうなんて……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that big sis would turn into just an ordinary girl..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 姐御はそんな風に謝ったりしねぇ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Big sis would never apologize like that!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 姐御はもう普通の女の子……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Big sis is just an ordinary girl now...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺達が凄んだらビビるだろう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She’d get scared if we acted tough."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 泣き出すフラワー傭兵団の面々を前に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In front of the members of the Flower Mercenary Group who began to cry,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エレナは何も出来ずおろおろしていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Elena stood helplessly, at a loss for what to do.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 皆さんがこんなに悲しんでるのに……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even though everyone is so sad..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あんたが悪いわけじゃ……」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We’re going to leave here now..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とぼとぼと傭兵団の面々が去って行く。
この包帯は一日経ったら交換して下さい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Please change this bandage after one day."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: では、この添え木をつけて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now, I’ll put this splint on,

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふふふ、女を知らんな、カオス。
「ま、まだ心臓がどきどきしてる……」
ぎゅうと締め付けられて痛む胸を押さえ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Pressing her chest that was painfully squeezed tightly,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エレナは熱っぽい息を吐いた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Elena let out a feverish breath.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何故かエレナはランスに惚れていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: For some reason, Elena had fallen in love with Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスがヘルマンの革命に参加していた頃――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Back when Rance was participating in Hellman’s revolution—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達に敗れたエレナが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Elena, who was defeated by Rance and his group,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 血吸いベッタンの呪いから解放されていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was freed from the curse of the blood-sucking Bettan.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 姐御がただの女の子になっちまうなんて……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that big sis would turn into just an ordinary girl..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 姐御はそんな風に謝ったりしねぇ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Big sis would never apologize like that!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 姐御はもう普通の女の子……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Big sis is just an ordinary girl now...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺達が凄んだらビビるだろう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She’d get scared if we acted tough."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 泣き出すフラワー傭兵団の面々を前に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In front of the members of the Flower Mercenary Group who began to cry,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エレナは何も出来ずおろおろしていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Elena stood helplessly, at a loss for what to do.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 皆さんがこんなに悲しんでるのに……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even though everyone is so sad..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あんたが悪いわけじゃ……」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We’re going to leave here now..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とぼとぼと傭兵団の面々が去って行く。
この包帯は一日経ったら交換して下さい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Please change this bandage after one day."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: では、この添え木をつけて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now, I’ll put this splint on,
